name: shreddies
detailedDescription: Shreddies... 'Cereal in the daytime?!' 'Wow, I've never heard of that before.'

attributes.smell: They have an oddly delicious malty smell to them whilst still having a hit of dry cardboard.
attributes.taste: They're a rare daytime treat. It's hard to describe the happy feeling of holding a solitary shreddie on your tongue whilst stood in your place of work but it's rather good.
